articles.title: Scottish technology saves diabetic man from double leg amputation - BBC.com
articles.description: Barry Mayled avoided double leg amputation thanks to a microwave technology developed in Scotland.
articles.content:
Architect and gardener, Mr Mayled said he wants to continue working now his health has improved
A diabetic patient has had both legs saved from amputation by new microwave technology.

articles.title: Planet smells like rotten eggs, study finds - BBC.com
articles.description: Most of HD 189733 b's atmosphere is hydrogen sulphide, which is also emitted during farts.
articles.content:
A faraway planet known for its dire weather also whiffs of rotten eggs, according to a new study.
